body: Soo I added pipeline & SASS which seems to be working alright locally, but I had to adjust the `STATICFILES_STORAGE` setting that was previously being used by whitenoise. I had the [whitenoise storage inherit from the pipeline storage](https://github.com/mozilla/normandy/pull/95/commits/65dc089065316a546ec0055b52de608065353827), which seems to work great locally but I'm not totally sure what other implications that might have. Anything I should be concerned about?  Is there any particular environment in `settings.py` where `STATICFILES_STORAGE` should _not_ be set to this?
